room_title: Escape room "Superhero Bank Escape" by Can You Rob The Bank? in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Went with 2 friends and we had a great time. Customer service is awesome. I spoke to 2 people and they were both very accommodating and helpful! Jenna was our host and she really made sure we had a great time, while also being super helpful and accommodating. We'll be back :)

room_title: Escape room "Superhero Bank Escape" by Can You Rob The Bank? in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was a lot of fun! Great way to spend an hour laughing amongst friends! Would definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Superhero Bank Escape" by Can You Rob The Bank? in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We had a blast for our corporate team building event! Adam and Rhiannon were our hosts and were great!

room_title: Escape room "Superhero Bank Escape" by Can You Rob The Bank? in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: While visiting from Phx, my sister, her husband, and I did the Superhero room. Our gamemaster was Alex, who did a Super job (thx, Alex!), but alas, the bad guys won this round. This room had lots of varied puzzles, some of which I hadn't seen before. This room would be a kick for kids, but anyone of any age would have a blast in here. My only complaint is that it is too dark to see a lot of the locks properly, which wastes time. Other than that, we had a SUPER time at this location. I highly recommend to travelers and locals alike.

room_title: Escape room "Superhero Bank Escape" by Can You Rob The Bank? in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The Superhero Escape was awesome! I bought this experience for my son's 15th birthday. He had a ball. It was a perfect first room escape for him.
